FindingName: Soft Delete Not Enabled for Storage Accounts
Description: Soft delete for identified Storage Accounts is disabled. Soft delete allows you to recover an accidentally deleted containers and blobs for a specified amount of time. This prevents any accidental loss of data.
Remediation: Navigate to the Azure Portal → Navigate to your storage account → click on "Data Protection" tab → check the box for "Enable soft delete for blobs" → enter a retention period in days. The recommended configuration for Soft Delete Retention is 90 days.
